intro: Aeschynomene stellaris, commonly known as starleaf aeschynomene, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the legume family, Fabaceae, and is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and clusters of white or pale blue flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in grasslands or along riverbanks. It is known for its ability to fix nitrogen, making it an important plant in soil enrichment and agricultural systems.
